items.headline: Elon Musk’s $1 trillion pay package gets a ‘no’ from Norway. Historically, the fund hasn’t been a bellwether.
items.summary_en: Norway’s sovereign wealth fund, one of the biggest investors in Tesla, is opposing a plan to award Elon Musk up to $1 trillion in pay. But historically, the fund has not been a bellwether on key Tesla votes.
